document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">ones </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">disappeared </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">are </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#40e4cc">back </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#08ffb8">Phebe </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">crow </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#80ff60">Precisely </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">March </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">heard </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffa444">curtness </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">Jay </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">this </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">an </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffa444">Autumn </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">or </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#58d4e8">Spring </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">My </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">wisdom </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">loses </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">way </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">One </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">side </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">nuts </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">are </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">ripe </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">other </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">side </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">May. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: The ones that disappeared are back
